channel.title: qnap on Codifice
channel.description: Recent content in qnap on Codifice

item.title: Infrastructure: Replacing a Dead RAID 5 Drive in QNAP NAS
item.description: It’s been a while since I last posted – it’s been crazy busy at work – and this is a completely non-.Net related post (sorry).  However, like many of you (I’m  sure) I’ve got a personal SVN repository (where I keep my .Net code, so there is a tenuous link!) which is hosted on my QNAP 419P NAS Drive on a RAID5 volume across 4 Hot Swappable Disks.  For the non-technical, this is a little whizzy box with tonnes of space and can withstand a single complete hard disk failure without loosing data.
